sentences.sContent: I rarely go to that restaurant for lunch.
sentences.sContent_eng: I rarely go to that restaurant for lunch.
sentences.sCn: 我很少到那家餐厅吃午饭。

sentences.sContent: We rarely see someone go after the health area.
sentences.sContent_eng: We rarely see someone go after the health area.
sentences.sCn: 我们很少见到有人在健康领域做文章。

sentences.sContent: ...People rarely manage to quit the first time they try...
...Mount Hua was rarely visited owing to the dangerous paths to the top...
...such books, which only rarely end up in permanent collections...
...slippery concepts that are rarely thought through...
...and I rarely left the office on time...
...And that means that for the first time people will have a chance to get up close and personal with the type of African-American woman they so rarely see...
...I very rarely do anything work-related so it’s easy to escape the markets...
